comments:
I started up I2003-10-07 on an old workspace (smoke test for the integration
build after 2003-09-02).

I have the following class in project "asdk"

public class Foab {

	/* (non-Javadoc)
	 * @see java.lang.Object#finalize()
	 */
	protected void finalize() throws Throwable {
		fapa();
	}

	/**
	 * 
	 */
	private void fapa(Object faba) {
		if (faba instanceof Cloneable)
			return;
		System.out.println("bla");
	}

}

Note that I added the System.out.println("bla")

When I try to build (ctrl-b), I get a dialog box saying "the operation cannot
proceed because it is blocked by: Implicit Job"
When I click "cancel", I get this in the log:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 Oct 08, 2003 11:18:53.885
!MESSAGE Exception in org.eclipse.ui.actions.GlobalBuildAction.run:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException:
